text: Margarita Nikolyan (born 27 May 1974) is an Armenian cross-country skier. She competed in four events at the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Armenian female cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Armenia Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gyumri
title: Margarita Nikolyan
